name: T2P Holdings Company Limited
description: Developer of an e-wallet and payment gateway platform designed to facilitate electronic payment. The company's platform features a prepaid digital wallet with reward points and card services usable in online transactions and offline stores, enabling users to transfer money and pay bills in a simplified way.
one_liner: Developer of an e-wallet and payment gateway platform designed to facilitate electronic payment. The company's platform features a prepaid digital wallet with reward points and card services usable in online transactions and offline stores, enabling users to transfer money and pay bills in a simplified way.
